page.discussion: A large number of instructional videos for Alpha Anywhere can be found in the Video Finder. Videos in the Video Finder are broken into categories based on the type of information they cover. Videos can also be searched.

description.p: This video shows how to open the Video Finder and search for videos on a specific topic.

section.description: There are several ways to access the *[ui:Video Finder]*: selecting *[ui:Video Finder]* from the *[ui:Help]* menu or clicking *[ui:Videos]* on the Web Projects Control Panel.
